document_data.name: Halls of Hilmer
document_data.mainbody: The '''Halls of Hilmer''' was an armorer's shop located in [[Waterdeep]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The shop stood a single story tall.
document_data.Location: The Halls of Hilmer was located in the southeast section of Waterdeep's [[Waterdeep/Castle Ward|Castle Ward]] on the west side of the [[Street of Bells]] south of [[Buckle Alley]]. The rear of the shop faced [[Duir's Alley]].{{Cite interactive atlas|Volo 5261}}
document_data.Services: [[Magical]] and normal [[armor]] could be acquired within the shop.
